main: Why are you working for the Dragonlord
branch_1: Hm? Got a death wish, human?
If you're looking for somewhere to die, go throw yourself at the fusions. They're always itching for a fight.
branch_2: Piss off, before I break you and your friend there.
branch_3: Pays well enough. And It's not like I have much else doing.
How much is he paying you?
branch_5: A knowing grin slides across his face.
Tell you what dear, the fusions here seem right ready to pound me when I least expect it.
You can have my services for 500 yen, and nothing less.
